Sentencas: An important segment of the future renewable energy economy is the implementation of novel energy generation systems.
Titulo: Inkjet Printing Functionalization of SOFC LSCF Cathodes

Sentencas: Such electrochemical systems are solid oxide fuel cells, which have the advantage of direct conversion of the chemical energy stored in the fuel to electrical energy with high efficiency.
Titulo: Inkjet Printing Functionalization of SOFC LSCF Cathodes

Sentencas: Improving the performance and lowering the cost of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) are strongly dependent on finding commercially viable methods for nano-functionalization of their electrodes via infiltration.
Titulo: Inkjet Printing Functionalization of SOFC LSCF Cathodes

Sentencas: Inkjet printing technology was proven to be a feasible method providing scalability and high-resolution ink delivery.
Titulo: Inkjet Printing Functionalization of SOFC LSCF Cathodes

Sentencas: LaxSr1-xCoyFe1-yO3- cathodes were modified using inkjet printing for infiltration with two different materials: Gd-doped ceria (CGO) commonly used as ion-conductor and La0.6Sr0.4CoO3- (LCO) commonly used as a mixed ionic electronic conductor.
Titulo: Inkjet Printing Functionalization of SOFC LSCF Cathodes

Sentencas: As-modified surface structures promoted the extension of the three-phase boundary (TPB) and enhanced the mechanisms of the oxygen reduction reaction.
Titulo: Inkjet Printing Functionalization of SOFC LSCF Cathodes

Sentencas: Electrochemical impedance measurements revealed significantly lowered polarization resistances (between 2.7 and 3.7 times) and maximum power output enhancement of 24% for CGO infiltrated electrodes and 40% for LCO infiltrated electrodes.
Titulo: Inkjet Printing Functionalization of SOFC LSCF Cathodes
